name: The Haunted Jaunt Game
description: This game was created in Unity as well as a project I did in school where we had to follow a tutorial called John's Lemon's Haunted Jaunt on Unity Learn. This was an introduction to animation, rendering, lighting, and texturing of 3D game assets in an environment. Even though this game is really short but interesting and fun. This gave me ideas and tips on how 3D games should be.
